  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_426</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_426</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Representación e interpretación de gráficas</string>
            <string language="en">Representation and interpretation of graphs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung und Deutung der Diagramme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Représentation et traduction des graphiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Respresentação e interpretação dos gráficos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rappresentazione ed interpretazione dei grafici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντιπροσώπευση και ερμηνεία των γραφικών παραστάσεων</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones la representación y estudio gráfico de funciones elementales. Se estudian las funciones lineales, cuadráticas, radicales y de proporcionalidad inversa.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to represent and study the graphs of elementary functions. It studies linear functions, quadratic functions, roots and inverse proportionality.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">proporcionalidad inversa</string>
            <string language="en">inverse proportionality</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">radical</string>
            <string language="en">root</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cuadrática</string>
            <string language="en">quadratic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">gráfica</string>
            <string language="en">graph</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">lineal</string>
            <string language="en">linear</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función</string>
            <string language="en">function</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, die Diagramme der grundlegenden Funktionen darzustellen 
und zu studieren. Sie studiert lineare Funktionen, quadratische 
Funktionen, Wurzeln und umgekehrte Proportionatität.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations de représenter et étudier les graphiques des fonctions 
élémentaires. Elle étudie des fonctions linéaires, des 
fonctions quadratiques, des racines et la proportionnalité inverse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações 
representar e estudar os gráficos de funções elementares. 
Estuda funções lineares, funções quadráticas, raizes e o 
proportionality inverso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
rappresentare e studiare i grafici delle funzioni elementari. 
Studia le funzioni lineari, le funzioni quadratiche, le radici e
la proporzionalità inversa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να αντιπροσωπεύσει και να μελετήσει τις γραφικές παραστάσεις 
των στοιχειωδών λειτουργιών. Μελετά τις γραμμικές 
λειτουργίες, τις δευτέρου βαθμού λειτουργίες, τις ρίζες και την 
αντίστροφη αναλογικότητα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">umgekehrte Proportionatität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wurzel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">quadratisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diagramm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">linear</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">proportionnalité inverse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
